title: quarkus cli fail hard on bad settings.xml

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

make an error in `~/.m2/settings.xml` like put a start element but no end element.

now quarkus create app gives you:

```
quarkus create app app --stream=2.13 --jbang
[ERROR] ‚ùó  Unable to create project: Failed to initialize the Maven artifact resolver
```

No extra info.

Fix the typos in settings.xml and it works.

You can still make invalid settings.xml but with balanced tags  - then you get an actual exception printed as warning.l

looks like we are not catching and reporting properly the maven resolver creation in these cases.

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

report failure to parse the settings.xml file.
